original: [From.GetBestName] has failed in [From.GetPossPronoun] attempts to get the decadent [FromFrom.GetBestName] to straighten up. He is a kafir and can be imprisoned freely by all rulers of our shamed dynasty.
translation: [From.GetBestName]未能在[From.GetPossPronoun]试图让腐败的[FromFrom.GetBestName]重新恢复过来。他现在是一名可耻的卡菲勒，可以被我们家族的所有统治者随意囚禁。

original: Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], has become Decadent, bringing shame to the House of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
translation: 家门不幸，您的[GetFromRelation][From.GetBestName]已经成为腐败的源泉，简直是[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]的耻辱！

original: Decadence lost from grant to dynasty member: §G$DECADENCE$%§! (the effect is relative to the dynasty's current Decadence.)
translation: 授予头衔给家族成员将会使家族腐败减少：§G$DECADENCE$%§!（效果与家族当前的腐化度相关）
